class cls_reg.LinReg(x, y, z, deg)[source]¶
MSE(z, zpred)[source]¶

Finds the mean squared error of the real data and predicted values :param z: real data :param zpred: predicted data :type z: array :type zpred: array :return: The mean squared error :rtype: float

R2(z, zpred)[source]¶

Finds the R2 error of the real data and predicted values :param z: real data :param zpred: predicted data :type z: array :type zpred: array :return: The mean squared error :rtype: float

Parameters:

  • z (array) – The values we are trying to fit
  • deg (int) – The degree of polynomial we try to fit the data
